summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North 34th Street, from west margin of Evanston Avenue to east margin of Fremont avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7216, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
